name: Jumping Duel
description:
Jumping duel is a local-multiplayer platformer for you and your friend. Your main objective is not to jump as high as you can, but jump higher than your friend. You can push your friend, block his jumps by standing above him or jump on his head just to beat him. The player that stays in the game longer wins.

Controls

Player 1               Player 2               Left          Left arrowA
RightRight arrowDJumpUp arrowW

Credits

Font Karma Future by Raymond Larabie  

Music by Eric Matyas - www.soundimage.org
